resources.string: To place a call, first turn off Airplane mode.
To place a call, enter a valid number.
Can\'t call. %s is not an emergency number.
Can\'t call. Dial an emergency number.
To call voicemail, first turn off Airplane mode.
To set up voicemail, go to Menu > Settings.
Can\'t make emergency calls over WiFi
You\'ll clear the frequently contacted list in the Contacts and Phone apps, and force email apps to learn your addressing preferences from scratch.
